name: Long Jump Summer Games 2016
description:
Take a running jump into the championships and compete against teams from around the world to win gold! Run fast along the runway and time your perfect jump to leap as as far as you can and earn that medal. Set the highest time, break the world record and stand proud on the podium.

Tap fast to run and perform the long jump. But don't jump too early or you will foul up your dreams.

- Play the Long jump!
- Win gold!
- Leap further than your team rivals!
- Unlock many levels of the championship!
